        public Schematron newSchematron(URL schematron)
                         throws SchematronCompilationException
        Description copied from interface: SchematronCompiler
        Create a new Schematron instance that represents a pre-compiled schematron.
        Specified by:
        newSchematron in interface SchematronCompiler
        Parameters:
        schematron - the ISO Schematron ruleset to load
        Returns:
        a Schematron instance that can be later evaluated
        Throws:
        SchematronCompilationException - if an error occurred while preparing the Schematron instance
